actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the tariffs of engines with cylinder capacity of less than 1 liter, designed for motor vehicles of heading 8709.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of certain engines to be installed in work trucks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the tariffs of engines with cylinder capacity of less than 1 liter, designed for motor vehicles of heading 8709.
